author: patriciacM8099LG
title: Luxury boutique hotel in great location - Review
text: A fabulous room to retreat to in midst of midtown Manhattan. Total comfort and lots of help with making the most of New York experience. Room Upgraded by the reception staff, concierge and door staff always helpful and friendly. Quality of room finish and amenities were excellent.
